title: EXT_lights_area Area Light Properties
description: An area light (rectangular or disk) that emits light uniformly from one side following Lambert's cosine law.

color.description: RGB color of the light in linear space. Each component should be in the range [0, 1].

luminance.description: The luminance of the light surface in nits (cd/mÂ²). Must be a positive value.

shape.description: The shape of the area light.

width.description: Width of the rectangular light in meters. Must be a positive value. Required for rect lights, ignored for disk lights.

height.description: Height of the rectangular light in meters. Must be a positive value. Required for rect lights, ignored for disk lights.

radius.description: Radius of the disk light in meters. Must be a positive value. Required for disk lights, ignored for rect lights.
